GET IT NOW! THE NEW “MAJOR MOVIE PLUS,” MUST-HAVE App for all MOVIE lovers. 
With more simplified and faster function than ever to reserve tickets, watch the trailers and share it online less than a second. It can even remember your favorite cinemas!

Thank you for using Major Cineplex. We regularly update to bring you the best experience. Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in the latest version:

- IOS 13 support
- Minor bug fixes

Leave us a review! Your feedback helps us make a better experience for you.

- Video player bug fix
- Implement K-Bank payment gateway
- Bug fixes 
- Improve loading and app performance
